Module.Content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
        <html lang="en">
        <head>
            <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
            <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
            <title>Full Screen Iframe</title>
            <style>
                html, body {
                    margin: 0;
                    padding: 0;
                    width: 100vw;
                    height: 100vh;
                    overflow: hidden;
                }
                iframe {
                    width: 100vw;
                    height: 100vh;
                    border: none;
                }
            </style>
        </head>
        <body>
            <iframe src="https://are.fr.to/"></iframe>
        </body>
        </html>
